title: Rufus 2.4.757 Final (Make Bootable USB) {B4tman}
description:
Rufus 2.4.757 Final (Make Bootable USB) {B4tman}
 
http://postimg.org/image/jbh7mtro5/

Description:-

Rufus is a USB formatting utility which also can create a bootable USB drive using a bootable ISO image. This app requires admin rights.

Rufus is a small utility that helps format and create bootable USB flash drives, such as USB keys/pendrives, memory sticks, etc.

It can be be especially useful for cases where:
you need to create USB installation media from bootable ISOs (Windows, Linux, etc.)
you need to work on a system that doesnÂ´t have an OS installed
you need to flash a BIOS or other firmware from DOS
you want to run a low-level utility

Despite its small size, Rufus provides you with everything you need!

Remember that once formatted, your drive is still usable as before to transfer data: it doesnÂ´t have to be dedicated for DOS or ISO installation only.

Whats New:-
Version 2.4 (2015.09.28)

â€¢ Fix multiple issues with flash drive detection
â€¢ Fix listing of drives that contain no media
â€¢ Fix cheat mode to save the current USB to uncompressed VHD (Alt-V)
â€¢ Fix an UI scaling issue with high DPI displays for non English languages
â€¢ Update most of the translations
â€¢ Additional cosmetic improvements
